rows.label: tev021401_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev021401_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Tika about Skells.

rows.label: tev021401_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Tika if anything is troubling her.

rows.label: tev021401_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Tika about schematics.

rows.label: tev021401_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Tika about Skells.

rows.label: tev021401_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask Tika about the Prog Ares.

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0001
rows.name:
When the White Whale was attacked, it was the Skell
team of the Special Operations Heavy Armor Training
Unit that overcame the xenoforms' military superiority.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0002
rows.name:
Colonel Elma and Irina fought like their very souls had
entered their Skells and were controlling them directly.
It was an awe-inspiring sight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0003
rows.name:
They shot down one enemy after another until they
eventually chased them off entirely.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0004
rows.name:
That was when I became aware of the infinite amount
of untapped potential that Skells possess.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0005
rows.name:
We mechanics do our part to make the machines—
all we ask in return is that the BLADEs who pilot them
exploit that untapped potential.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0006
rows.name:
If you do, then I can't imagine any obstacle we humans
won't be able to overcome.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0009
rows.name:
We're currently seeking a sparring partner for our test
pilot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0010
rows.name:
But our pilot is a little bit...quirky, so we've had
problems filling the position.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0011
rows.name:
As things stand, we aren't able to obtain any test data,
which means our new weapon cannot be put to use in
the actual field.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0012
rows.name:
We need to find a BLADE operative who's skilled
enough to face off against a Skell, and find them fast.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0045
rows.name:
If you find a schematic for a piece of equipment,
it won't be for any old thing that you can just
buy at a shop.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0046
rows.name:
Schematics allow an arms manufacturer to assemble
special "nonstandard" weapons and armor that aren't
available on the open market yet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0047
rows.name:
If you find one, you should take it straight to
the AM terminal in Armory Alley to see what
sort of gear it's for.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0048
rows.name:
Of course, you'll have to provide the materials before
it can be made for you, but it'll almost certainly be
something useful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0054
rows.name:
When we fought off the xenoforms that attacked the
White Whale, a Skell that I'd never seen before played
a major role in our victory.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0055
rows.name:
I've always wondered what that Skell was,
so I've started looking into it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0056
rows.name:
Unfortunately, it's highly classified—all I was able to
learn is that it's called the Ares, and it's currently being
kept in the restricted hangar.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0057
rows.name:
I wonder what sort of special power it possesses?
It must be something really incredible if they're keeping
such a tight lid on it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0058
rows.name:
The Skell that Lao took with him was a new model
known as the Prog Ares.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0059
rows.name:
Apparently its design was based on the original Ares,
that top-secret Skell of unknown origin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0060
rows.name:
They say it's an incredible machine with a level of
power that even makes it a match for Team Elma.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0061
rows.name:
Which begs the question—why has it been parked in
a hangar all this time instead of being out in the field?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0062
rows.name:
I'm sure there has to be some logical reason.
But as a mechanic, I'm just dying to get my hands
on that thing![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Tika if anything is troubling her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0013
rows.name:
I've really started to question myself ever since that
prototype of mine performed so poorly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0014
rows.name:
I'm so obsessed with improving functionality that I have
a bad habit of neglecting to consider the costs of
production.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0015
rows.name:
I fall in love with schematics like they're my children,
and gradually make them stronger and stronger.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0016
rows.name:
But if that ends up causing them to be mothballed,
it defeats the whole purpose.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0017
rows.name:
I make fun of Alexa for being so in love with Skells,
but it turns out that I'm no better.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0018
rows.name:
You make it sound like loving Skells is such
a bad thing![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0019
rows.name:
But regardless, I like the weapons that you make.
I hope you'll make another prototype I can test soon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0020
rows.name:
Thanks. Next time, I'll make sure it's something good
enough to use in actual combat![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Tika about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0021
rows.name:
I heard all the details about what happened.
So it was just a big misunderstanding after all.
And this time it wasn't a man, but a woman.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0022
rows.name:
But I guess Alexa is always like that. Once she gets
involved with a Skell, she loses sight of everything
else around her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0023
rows.name:
I can't even count the number of male mechanics and
pilots that made the same mistake. Poor bastards...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0024
rows.name:
But no matter how often I warn her about that sort
of thing, she never seems to understand what I am
talking about.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0025
rows.name:
I guess that's a sign the Skell obsession's gone a little
too far.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0027
rows.name:
But what am I supposed to do?
You know I don't care about things like that![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0028
rows.name:
All I need in my life is Skells!
I'd marry one if I could![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0029
rows.name:
Yes, I know. And I don't blame you for that.
I just wish we could head off these tragedies
before another poor fool goes over that cliff.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_SEL3021
rows.name: Ask Tika about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0030
rows.name:
That was great work, how you recovered the data from
Camber's fight with the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0031
rows.name:
I can't even tell you how valuable it is to have data
on how our new weapon fares in battle![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0032
rows.name:
Of course, the data makes it clear that our current
design isn't enough to stop the Ganglion, but even
that is incredibly valuable to know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0033
rows.name:
Now I'm going to use a revised plan that incorporates
new xenoform technology to make it even better![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0034
rows.name:
I'm going to work so hard on this thing, it'll even put
Little Miss Skell Nut to shame. It is gonna blow the
Ganglion away...literally![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0036
rows.name:
Good luck, Tika! I can't wait to try it out once
you're finished![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0037
rows.name:
Sure! But this time it won't be a prototype—I'll make
sure it goes into production so you'll actually be able
to buy one for yourself![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021401_MSG0038
rows.name:
Wait, what? You're not going to give me a comp?
You are so cheap, Tika![ST:wait ]
